Name: Hedgerow Sling
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
7.5 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with soda and then DRIZZLE blackberry liqueur over drink. Serve with straws.
History: Created by Brian Duell at Detroit, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Hedgerow Sling contains 209 calories
